history.proof: intros A p T r [Hdomok Hincr]. qsimpl time: 1 use: prechain_sum. qsimpl time: 1 use: chain_single,prechain_sum. eapply prechain_dom_ok_ind. + intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: chain_single,prechain_sum. srun best use: pre_domok_incr_chain_2 unfold: pre_domok_incr_chain_def. + intros. auto. + apply Hdomok.

ctx: intros A p T r [Hdomok Hincr].
exceptions.tactic: apply prechain_sum in p as [Hsingle | Hconcat].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \\/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)" on hypothesis of type "prechain A".

exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \\/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x) A : Set p : prechain A T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A Hdomok : prechain_dom_ok A T p Hincr : prechain_incr A r p Unable to unify "chain ?M2252 ?M2254 ?M2255 (single ?M2252 ?M2253)" with "chain A T r p".

ctx: intros A p T r [Hdomok Hincr].
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \\/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x) H0 : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) A : Set p : prechain A T : mEnsemble A r : mRelation A Hdomok : prechain_dom_ok A T p Hincr : prechain_incr A r p x : Map ?A T0 : mEnsemble ?A H : T0 x Unable to unify "chain ?M2735 ?M2737 ?M2738 (single ?M2735 ?M2736)" with "chain A T r p".

ctx: intros A p T r [Hdomok Hincr].

original: intros A p T r [Hdomok Hincr]. apply prechain_sum in p as [Hsingle | Hconcat]. - destruct Hsingle as [x Hsingle]. rewrite Hsingle. apply chain_single. eapply prechain_dom_ok_ind. + intros. apply H0. + intros. auto. + apply Hdomok. - destruct Hconcat as [x [z Hconcat]]. rewrite Hconcat. apply prechain_dom_ok_ind with (P := fun T0 p0 => prechain_dom_ok A T0 p0 /\ prechain_incr A r p0 -> chain A T0 r p0). + intros x T0 HT0. intro. destruct H0. apply chain_single. auto. + intros x0 T0 z0 HT0 IHdomok IHintro [Hdok Hincr']. apply domok_concat with (x := x0) in Hdok; try auto. apply incr_concat with (x := x0) in Hincr'; try auto. apply chain_concat_m with (x := x0); try auto. apply IHintro. auto. + apply Hdomok. unfold prechain_incr. + intros; auto.
